script: Ever wonder how your phone predicts your next word? That’s N-gram language models in action! They guess the next word based on the words before it—like how ‘I love’ often leads to ‘you’ or ‘ice cream.’ Think of it like a word chain: the more links you see, the better you can predict what comes next. N-gram models use this trick to assign probabilities to words, helping everything from autocorrect to chatbots work smarter. They’re simple but powerful, making tech feel like it’s reading your mind!
